{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WNR834 |revision=B v1 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/12/2006 |manuf_country= |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY306100032 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4704 |cpu1_cspeed=264 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (32-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (32-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4321 |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM2055 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325F |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware=DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=NETGEAR |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=00:14:6C,00:18:4D |oui_eth=00:14:6C,00:18:4D }} '''RangeMax NEXT Wireless Router''' {{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=WNR834Bv1|vs_id=2616}} *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/netgear/wnr834b On '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Netgear_WNR834Bv1 On '''DD-WRT''' wiki] {{TechInfoDepot|Netgear_WNR834B_1.0}} [http://www.tomsguide.com/us/draft-11n-revealed-part2,review-737-2.html On '''Tom's Guide''']
[http://www.3dnews.ru/communication/netgear_wnr834b Review on '''3DNews'''] (router interface screenshots) The wireless module is OEM [[SerComm]] (YBQ00A-0.8MM). :The main board is also OEM SerComm. There is also an FCC ID entry for the wireless module at PY306200045.
